If $g$ is a differentiable function such that $g(x) < 0$ for all real numbers $x$ and $f$ is a differentiable function such that $f^{\prime} = (x^2 - 9) \cdot g(x)$, which of the following sentences is true?
options: $f$ has a relative maximum at $x = -3$ and a relative minimum at $x = 3$
$f$ has a relative minimum at $x = -3$ and a relative maximum at $x = 3$
$f$ has relative minima at $x = -3$ and at $x = 3$
$f$ has relative maxima at $x = -3$ and at $x = 3$

questions.q: Each rectangular page of a book must contain $18\text{ cm}^2$ of printed text, and each page must have $2\text{ cm}$ margins at top and bottom, and $1\text{ cm}$ margin at each side. What is the minimum possible area of such a page?
